alert.note: Alert for Kewaunee; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 9:03AM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW ENDING THIS MORNING... .Light to moderate snow will end from west to east as a storm system pulls away from the region. Minor blowing and drifting snow is possible. Snow covered and slippery roads are expected through the morning commute. Use extra caution if traveling. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Manitowoc and Kewaunee Counties. * WHEN...Until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
